rows.label: tlk42420151_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Do you know the new religious group
called the Harbingers of Eschapon?

rows.label: tlk42420151_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Chocholo finds their teachings
deeply inspiring!

rows.label: tlk42420151_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Their ideas are exactly what us
Nopon need right now!

rows.label: tlk42420151_04_msg0004
rows.name: Huh? That cult went bust already?

rows.label: tlk42420151_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Chocholo thought even someone like
me who can't speak proper Nopon
might find a home in their new world!
